1433220.name: Recurring Dreams Demo
1433220.description:
Demo Version 1.04 of Recurring Dreams

Features:
- Multitouch Touchscreen Support
- Gamepad Support
- Keyboard Support
- Adjustable Gameplay Settings
- Adjustable Touchscreen Buttons
- Remappable Gamepad/Keyboard Controls
- Volume Controls
- 3 Save Files
Demo Includes:
- 1 Tutorial Stage
- 1 Primary Stage
- 2 Mini-Game Stages
- 1 Hub Stage
- 4 Unique Attack Powers to Use/Learn
- 2 Thought Powers to Use/Learn
- 1 Movement Upgrade to Find
- Story Introduction
- Character Dialogs
1433220.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
